comment: A variant of the Axiom of Power Sets ~ ax-pow . For any set ` x ` , there exists a set ` y ` whose members are exactly the subsets of ` x ` i.e. the power set of ` x ` . Axiom Pow of [BellMachover] p. 466. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2006.)
